description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-38010):

1. Download the relevant KB updates provided below.

2. Apply the updates to the corresponding Windows version and build as specified.

3. Ensure to restart your system after applying the updates to allow changes to take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the issue related to improper handling of length parameter inconsistency impacting secure boot.
- Update packages can be downloaded from:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system is running one of the specified Windows builds.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
